Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.util

Class TopArray

java.lang.Object
com.github.oeuvres.alix.util.TopArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<TopArray.IdScore>
public class TopArray extends Object implements Iterable<TopArray.IdScore>
A queue to select the top elements from a score array where index is a kind of id, and value is a score.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    TopArray.IdScore
    A mutable pair (id, score), sortable on score only, used as cells in arrays.

    • isInsertable

      public boolean isInsertable(double score)
      Test if score is insertable, true if:
      • top is not full
      • score is bigger than min() in natural order
      • score is lower than max() in reverse order
      Parameters:
      score -
